posts.post_title: FS: T205 Chief Bender SGC 55 *NEW CARDS ADDED* C46, T201 & T207 **1 Cards Left!**
posts.post_content:
I hate to part with the Chief, but I need to refocus my collection.  Graded 55 by SGC, this T205 example shows vibrant colors, and nice corners.  PayPal F/F, shipping included! [STRIKE]$179[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$169[/STRIKE] $159

C46 Imperial, Bob Holmes.  Pretty cool miscut, on the back top of the card, another card number is visible. [STRIKE]$23[/STRIKE] SOLD

T201 Mecca with Leifield & Simon. [STRIKE]$16[/STRIKE] SOLD

T207 Recruit, Tex Erwin, SGC 60. [STRIKE]$58[/STRIKE] $52 *SOLD*

T205 Piedmont, George Stone, real nice card. [STRIKE]$28[/STRIKE] SOLD
